package.json.description: Upgraded to Next.js 15.5.9, next-axiom 1.10.0, cookies-next 6.1.1. React stays at 18.2.0. Some peer dependency warnings from react-spring wanting React 19 but these are non-blocking.

src/env.mjs.description: Environment variable schema with zod validation. Client-side vars go in `client` schema and must be prefixed with NEXT_PUBLIC_. All vars must be added to processEnv object for access.

src/components/.description: All components using react-scroll, useState, useEffect, or other client-side features need "use client" directive in App Router. Components fixed: Navigation, Footer, Buchung, Impressionen, Elternzeit, ui/dialog, Sandra, Testimonials, Hero, Anfahrt, Angebot.
